meaningMnemonic: If you have <radical>seven</radical> <radical>swords</radical>, there's only so much you can do with them. The main thing? Probably using them to <kanji>cut</kanji> something.
readingMnemonic: Because having seven swords for yourself is too much, you decide to take the swords and divide them up amongst pairs of people. You <kanji>cut</kanji> them into pairs, and give <reading>sets</reading> (せつ) to everyone who needs them in the village.
